channel.title: Making new Game Design Company Need Staff
channel.description:
Ok Well you obviously read the topic but im making a New Game Design Company Called
Dark Star Design
And I Need Staff so if you would like to join the Team Pm me
[b]Do Not Post a Reply Asking to Get on Just PM ME!!![/b]
# of staff spots needed to be filled: 5
Programs that will be used:
Unity 3D Full Version And Other Programs Suggested
Got Any ideas on a new game Pm ME!!!

item.title: Making new Game Design Company Need Staff
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

So you want people to join a company that you just made up, and offer their ideas, and suggest programs? What’s in it for them?

Anyway, try reposting over at the game development forum (http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/), I can’t see anyone wanting to join this in its current state though.

Read full topic
item.source: Making new Game Design Company Need Staff
